name: Easy Digital Downloads – Store Hours
author: Daniel J Griffiths

sections.description:
Store hours provides a complete solution to managing your hours of operation on Easy Digital Downloads. With a rapidly expanding list of features, it’s all you’ll ever need for store scheduling!

Features of the plugin include:

  • Per-day hours of operation
  • Manual override to allow closing your store on the fly
  • Admin bar tab to provide quick, visual notification when your store is offline
  • Customizable handling for product display when your store is closed
  • Customizable store hours widget
  • Developer friendly with actions and filters to allow extension
  • 100% localization friendly

Planned features include:

  • Flexible notification bars to notify users when your store is closed
  • Live calendar to pre-define closed days beyond the traditional day-to-day (holidays, vacations, and the like)
  • The ability to shut the store down completely when closed, redirecting the user to a splash page or offsite

Follow this plugin on GitHub
sections.installation:
1. Activate the plugin
  2. Go to Downloads > Settings > Store Hours and configure the options
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1.0 (July 30, 2016)

  • Codebase cleanup
  • Update to new EDD settings standards

Version 1.0.1 (May 26, 2015)

  • Replace PHP4 contructors

Version 1.0.0 (May 29, 2014)

  • Initial release!
